author: Juliette Gash
title: Concern among NGOs on spread of virus in refugee camps
description: NGOs working with refugees abroad say they're extremely concerned about an outbreak of Covid-19 in refugee camps.
content:
NGOs working with refugees abroad say they're extremely concerned about an outbreak of Covid-19 in refugee camps.
Moria is Europe's largest refugee camp, and home to some 20,000 people. The refugee camp was built on the Greek island of Lesbos to provide shel… [+6322 chars]
